definitions.definition: An interruption to the regular flow or sequence of something.
examples: The network created a disruption in the show when they broke in with a newscast .
There was great disruption in the classroom when the teacher left.

definitions.definition: A breaking or bursting apart; a breach .

main_definition: An interruption to the regular flow or sequence of something.
secondary_definitions: A breaking or bursting apart; a breach .
